item.title: BTCL gets approval for virtual network operator
item.description: Bangladesh Telecommunications Company Limited (BTCL) has received approval to operate experimentally as a Mobile Virtual Network Operator (MVNO) in the country. Faiz Ahmad Taiyeb, chief advisor's special assistant on ICT, shared the development in a Facebook post on Sunday, reports bdnews24.com.
